content: OpenDOAR Repositories - Egypt http://www.opendoar.org Selected records from the OpenDOAR Directory of Open Access Repositories for Egypt en-GB 2015-03-20T04:15:06Z SHERPA, University of Nottingham OpenDOAR Database RSS Feed Generator OpenDOAR Logo http://www.opendoar.org/images/OpenDOAR.png http://www.opendoar.org/ Cairo University Digital Repository URL:http://193.227.11.172/cudr Organisation:Cairo University (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd), Egypt Description:This is the institutional repository for Cairo University which contains technical reports, and regulations and policies as well as manuscripts, rare books and historical photographs and archival documents. The interface is in English and Arabic Software:DSpace Size:1 items (2015-01-05) Subjects:Multidisciplinary Content:Articles; Unpublished; Multimedia; Special Languages:Arabic; English Policies:[Not yet analysed] Date Added:2014-03-31 ]]> http://www.opendoar.org/find.php?rID=3016&format=full 2014-03-31T11:46:13Z Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library URL:http://digitalcollections.aucegypt.edu/ Organisation:Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library, American University in Cairo (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd), Egypt Description:The Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library at the American University in Cairo provides online, open access to unique cultural heritage resources, such as photograph albums, minutes of the board of trustees for the University, Coptic language manuscripts, stereo views, architectural drawings and modern items also. OAI-PMH:http://server15795.contentdm.oclc.org/cgi-bin/oai.exe Software:CONTENTdm Size:12575 items (2015-03-03) Subjects:History and Archaeology; Language and Literature; Philosophy and Religion Content:Books; Multimedia; Special Languages:English Policies:Metadata policies unknown; Full data item policies unknown; Content policies defined; Submission policies unknown; Preservation policies unknown Date Added:2013-07-05 ]]> http://www.opendoar.org/find.php?rID=2707&format=full 2013-07-05T16:24:19Z Arab Repository for Library and Information Studies (ARLIS) URL:http://www.arlis.info/home.asp?redirect=%2Fdefault%2Easp Organisation:Helwan University (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd), Egypt Description:This site provides access to research in the field of library and information science, from the middle east. The interface is in Arabic. Some items are not available as full text. Some items are only accessible to registered users. The main interface is in Arabic, but once into the browse pages you can re-set this to a language of your choice. This repository uses Dublin Core. OAI-PMH:http://e-prints.bue.edu.eg/cgi/oai2 Software:EPrints Size:46 items (2010-02-04) Subjects:Multidisciplinary Content:Articles; Conferences Languages:English Policies:Metadata re-use policy explicitly undefined; Full data item policies explicitly undefined; Content policies explicitly undefined; Submission policies explicitly undefined; Preservation policies explicitly undefined Date Added:2009-03-10 ]]> http://www.opendoar.org/find.php?rID=1471&format=full 2009-03-10T10:10:32Z Digital Assets Repository (DAR) URL:http://dar.bibalex.org/webpages/dar.jsf Organisation:Bibliotheca Alexandrina (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd), Egypt Description:This site provides access to digital copies of books and images. For books that are out-of-copyright, their contents are fully available on the Internet. For books that are in copyright, Internet users can browse only 5% of the book, with a minimum of 10 pages. The interface is in English.
